amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to restore funding for the National Surface Transportation and Innovation Finance Bureau to FY22 funding levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
